participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Determined and adventurous, with a love for storytelling and exploration.
participant_1.background: I'm going to keep working hard and hope to do my best in the marathon. I don't trust anyone. I am a travel blogger who enjoys sharing my experiences with the world. I left college to pursue my passion for brewing beer. I am going to school for writing.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Caring and supportive, with a strong connection to family and a passion for adventure.
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to hike more efficiently with my family. I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place. I love pizza. I will continue to care for my mom and take walks with my dog. My family supports me while I pursue my writing career.

content.text: Hey, how are you?
I'm doing well! I'm just finishing up a hike with my family.
That's sounds fun! I'm always looking for new hiking trails to try.
Do you have any favorite spots?
I really like the trails in the Smoky Mountains.
Those are beautiful! I've always wanted to go there.
You should! The hiking is amazing and there are so many things to see and do.
I'll definitely have to put it on my list.
I'm also really into pizza.
Me too! It's my favorite food.
What's your favorite kind?
I love a good pepperoni pizza.
Me too! I also love a good white pizza with spinach and artichoke.
That sounds delicious!
I'm going to school for writing.
What kind of writing do you like to do?
I'm really interested in travel writing and blogging.
That sounds really cool! I'm always looking for new travel blogs to read.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm hoping to start my own blog soon.
I would love to read it when you do!
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's up.
Great!
